solution_line_template: If 50% of individuals that like football play it, and there are {like_football} out of 60 individuals that like it, then {like_football}*{play_fraction_percent}% = {play_football} out of 60 individuals play it
If {play_football} individuals play it out of {total_individuals} individuals then that means only {play_football}/{total_individuals} = 1/5 or {play_percent}% play it

If {play_percent}% of individuals play football out of a group of {group_size} people, one would expect {group_size}*{play_percent}% = <<{group_size}*{play_percent}*{percent_factor}={expected_play}>>{expected_play} individuals to play it
